body:
If spack is checked out in a [git worktree](https://git-scm.com/docs/git-worktree), all git-related commands fail because the `spack_is_git_repo()`-check is not thorough enough.

When developing in a feature-branch in a seperate worktree, this is annoying as all unittests regarding git-related spack commands fail, cluttering the test results with false-positives.
title: Fix git-related commands not working in worktrees
